metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1943 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw out of bounds memory write in the Linux kernel UDF file system functionality was found in the way user triggers some file operation which triggers udf_write_fi(). A local user could use this flaw to crash the system or potentially
